summary: A comprehensive test suite for the MSColab Flask application, covering core components such as chat handling, file management, API endpoints, data models, server routes, authentication, socket communication, utilities, and database seeding. The tests verify CRUD operations, permission enforcement, real‑time collaboration, token handling, and overall application behavior.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability, security, and correct functionality of the MSColab collaborative platform by automatically validating its business logic, data integrity, user permissions, and real‑time features before deployment.
